biotools.summary:
A Novel Comprehensive Resistome Analysis Tool.
sraX is designed to read assembled sequence files in FASTA format and systematically detect the presence of AMR determinants and, ultimately, describe the repertoire of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) within a collection of genomes (the “resistome” analysis).

bioschemas.name: sraX
